name: The Office Magnet
slogan: Find the environment that suits you, not just an office space
description: We help companies find their ideal office space.

team.name: Paul Declerck
team.bioHtml: Worked at Office Magnet, The Office Magnet

jobs.title: Intern: Business Development
jobs.description:
Urgent! 

Office Magnet is a young office brokerage firm who offers assistance to companies looking for to relocate. Here is our (temporary) website: https://theofficemagnet.co.uk/

You will be in charge of looking for prospects (mostly through Linkedin and Angel.co), classifying them by industry, size, etc and contacting them in order to generate interest on the company.

This position offers chances to great rewards: 

Your job will be to contact people on Linkedin to find out if they need an office space. If they do, you transfer them to me and I assist them in the search. If they end up taking an office we get a commission from the Landlord and I share it with you at 40% (the average commission in the industry is around 5000 GBP).

It's a pretty simple position as it only requires some organisation skills. 

If you are physically in London you can also attend physical events and meetings. 

Get in touch!

Paul

jobs.title: Intern: Content writer
jobs.description:
Urgent

You will be in charge of creating Commercial Real Estate content on the blog 3 times a week (between 500 to 2000 words).

Here is our website: https://theofficemagnet.co.uk/

This position can be held remotely and we need someone urgently. 

You will be given plenty of examples of blogs and inspirational websites to help you write. 

If you are interested please contact me directly, 

Paul@officemagnet.com
07599643128

jobs.title: Intern: Community Manager
jobs.description:
Urgent! 

Office Magnet is a young office brokerage firm who offers assistance to companies looking for to relocate. Here is our (temporary) website: https://theofficemagnet.co.uk/

You will be in charge of our Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram pages and your mission will be to create a community of followers on these platforms. 

Strong experience in social networks necessary, we will provide you all the tools you need to work and will listen to your propositions. 

If interested please contact me directly

Paul@officemagnet.com

jobs.title: Intern video production / editor / content creator
jobs.description:
At Office Magnet we help companies find office space in London by focusing on wellbeing and productivity. Our platform lists all the available units available on the market and shows what's so special about them (two lanes running track on the roof, a motion design studio room, etc.). 

Our strategy includes the creation of short videos (about one minute long) available on social medias like Youtube and Facebook, where we show these spaces and their exceptional amenities and features. The director of Office Magnet himself,Paul, will be presenting these videos. 

We are looking for an intern with previous experience in filming and editing to work on these videos with us. The position is part time and not paid. 

You will be offered an office to work from and the equipment needed. 

We are planing on filming one video per week at first between March and July. 

You physically need to be in London, uk, to apply to this position.

jobs.title: Intership: Public Relation (PR)
jobs.description:
At Office Magnet we help companies find office space in London by focusing on Wellbeing and Productivity. 
Our platform lists all the available units available on the market and shows what makes them so special in terms of wellbeing and productivity (two lanes running track on the roof, pink noise diffusers, in house nursery, etc.). 

Our strategy includes the development of our Public Relations department in order to reach new prospects. 

We are looking for an intern with previous experience in PR with classical and newer media. The position can be full or part time and not remunerated. the internship can be for 2 to 6 months (more: contact us)

You will be offered an office to work from if you are in London.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Office Magnet we help companies find office space in London by focusing on Wellbeing and Productivity.
Our platform lists all the available units available on the market and shows what makes them so special in terms of wellbeing and productivity (two lanes running track on the roof, pink noise diffusers, in house nursery, etc.).

Our strategy includes the development of our Public Relations department in order to reach new prospects.

We are looking for an intern with previous experience in PR with classical and newer media. The position can be full or part time and not remunerated. the internship can be for 2 to 6 months (more: contact us)

You will be offered an office to work from if you are in London.

jobs.title: Commercial real estate account manager / marketing / website optimisation
jobs.description:
Office Magnet is a brokerage firm, we help companies find office space in London. 

The concept is simple: marketing leads companies looking for an office to our online platform, the platform converts them into leads and the account manager (sales person) is responsible in transforming leads into deals. 

We are looking for assistance in every single of these three steps: Marketing, UX and sales. 

You need to be based in London and have at least a strong interest in commercial real estate (ideally some experience). You will receive training and commission on every deal closed. 

The job can be part time (10-20 hours a week) but long term engagement is crucial, you need to commit for at least 6 months. 
If successful, you will receive shares. 

You will be given an office, KPIs and responsibilities. 

Feel free to send your enquiry directly to Paul@officemagnet.com
